title: Failure of democracy post WWI Germany

content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.Discuss and analyze the political and economic reasons for the failure of parliamentary democracy in Germany after the First World War.

frqParts.text: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.Discuss and analyze the political and economic reasons for the failure of parliamentary democracy in Germany after the First World War.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
